This is the game I love the most but also hate the most. I have burned through alot of hours playing this frustrating but fun game. The community is fairly toxic the higher you go and the game is fairly unbalanced. I do recommend the game for new players but I wish the state of the meta was different as the current skill learning curve is very difficult for new players.

Rank 4 player here. This game lacks a normal competitive component, so it can somehow suit either casual players who are not interested in ranked games, or for playing with friends (again, as a casual non-competitive game). However, since the game is based on competition and does not have a normal ranking system, I am have to leave negative feedback.
Competitive play should be based on the ratio of wins to losses, the team's victory should be shared among all players. Neither one nor the other is in the game. Instead, the game uses a point system that the developers came up with for some reason. This scoring system punishes the player for playing well.
If you fix all the generators and the whole team escapes, at a high level of play (rank 4-1) you will be demoted because your game was too fast and you did not earn all the points you need. Likewise, you will be demoted if you were chasing the whole game and the whole team was able to escape, or if you supported the whole team and the whole team was able to escape. Even if it is more important right now to repair another generator for the team, you must switch to other processes.
Because, in order to raise the rank in this game, you need to switch to different actions - repair generators, heal the wounded teammates and seek adventure in pursuits, even if your character was not designed for this and even if the exit gates ready to be opened.
Disarming traps, sealing portals, awakening team members, and other actions that are beneficial to the team do not gain rank. But allowing the zombies to hit yourself in order to heal with Self-Care perk - gives a rank.
Instead of really important things, players must engage in useless actions, which is why I personally find this game unacceptable for myself. There are plenty of good online games out there, so don't waste your time and money on this game.

And the new joiners are basically the fish on the board that are pending for slaughter when they just brainlessly matchmaking to an experienced killer/survivor.

è un gioco diverso dagli altri, ha una grafica stupenda, ed il gameplay è top perché tanti fattori ti possono fare morire.
Ad esempio sbagliare un test abilità, fa in modo che il killer vedi la tua posizione, quindi devi stare attento e devi usare la testa per sopravvivere quasi sempre.
Ovviamente se il killer ti sta inseguendo devi essere bravo a creare i loop, ma questo lo si impara.
Morale: gioco consigliato

Fun game both for casual matches with friends and competitive matches online. I tend to really dislike competitive multi-player games, but the horror them and asymmetric gameplay in this really gets me. There are some issues with higher-level competitive play I dislike, but at a casual to slightly-more engaged level, this game is a ton of fun. The monetization system is kind of a bummer, but I suppose is slightly offset by the fact that the base game is only $20.
